briefTitle: A Follow-On Trial to Assess the Long Term Safety and Efficacy of SPM 927 in Painful Distal Diabetic Neuropathy
officialTitle: A Multi-Center, Open-Label, Follow-On Trial to Assess the Long Term Safety and Efficacy of SPM 927 in Subjects With Painful Distal Diabetic Neuropathy
summary: Phase 2/3 open-label trial to assess the safety and tolerability of long-term treatment with lacosamide (SPM 927) in subjects with painful diabetic neuropathy. The safety and tolerability of the different doses of lacosamide will be investigated.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects With Adverse Events (AEs) Reported Spontaneously by the Subject or Observed by the Investigator.
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Throughout the study up to a maximum study period of 2.8 years
